title: Happy 4th of July, The CEO, Comedy Roulette, MTH and more.
itunes:title: Happy 4th of July, The CEO, Comedy Roulette, MTH and more.
description:
Happy 4th of July and welcome to the ride!  The show starts with the debate of Tommy being both ugly and short.  What do you think?  We have advice on how to vacation on a budget.  In our health and fitness segment, we discuss push ups and its benefits.  Fool #2 shows us his talent as he murders another one in the spirit of Johnny Gill.  Want to hear the duet of the century?  We bring you Steve Harvey and J. Anthony Brown singing The Dramatics.  Instead of Ask Steve, Steve gets to ask the crew questions.  In Comedy Roulette, we talk about how you know that your nerves are bad when.....fill in the blank.  The crew gives well wishes for 4th of July to The Steve Harvey Nation.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about being resilient and so much more.  Have a great weekend!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
